nappo.schemes.workers_2dacs package¶

Submodules¶

nappo.schemes.workers_2dacs.cg_worker module¶

class nappo.schemes.workers_2dacs.cg_worker.CGWorker(index_worker, create_algo_instance, create_storage_instance, create_train_envs_instance, create_actor_critic_instance, create_test_envs_instance=<function CGWorker.<lambda>>, initial_weights=None)¶

Bases: nappo.schemes.base.worker.Worker

Worker class handling data collection and gradient computation.

This class wraps an actor_critic instance, a storage class instance and a train and a test vector of environments. It collects data, computes gradients and evaluates network versions following a logic defined in function self.step(), which will be called from the Learner class.

index_workerint

Worker index.

create_algo_instancefunc

A function that creates an algorithm class.

create_storage_instancefunc

A function that create a rollouts storage.

create_train_envs_instancefunc

A function to create train environments.

create_actor_critic_instancefunc

A function that creates a policy.

create_test_envs_instancefunc

A function to create test environments.

initial_weightsray object ID

Initial model weights.

index_workerint

Index assigned to this worker.

actor_criticnn.Module

An actor_critic class instance.

algoan algorithm class

An algorithm class instance.

envs_trainVecEnv

A VecEnv class instance with the train environments.

envs_testVecEnv

A VecEnv class instance with the test environments.

storagea rollout storage class

A Storage class instance.

iterint

Times gradients have been computed and sent.

ac_versionint

Number of times the current actor critic version been has been updated.

update_everyint

Number of data samples to collect between network update stages.

obstorch.tensor

Latest train environment observation.

rhstorch.tensor

Latest policy recurrent hidden state.

donetorch.tensor

Latest train environment done flag.

collect_data(num_steps)¶

Collect data from interactions with the environments.

num_stepsint

Target number of train environment steps to take.

total_timefloat

Elapsed time in seconds.

total_samplesint

Total num of collected samples.

compute_gradients(batch)¶

Calculate actor critic gradients.

batchdict

data batch containing all required tensors to compute algo loss.

grads: list of tensors

List of actor_critic gradients.

infodict

Summary dict of relevant gradient-related information.

evaluate()¶

Test current actor_critic version in self.envs_test.

mean_test_perffloat

Average accumulated reward over all tested episodes.

set_weights(weights)¶

Update the worker actor_critic version with provided weights.

weights: dict of tensors

Dict containing actor_critic weights to be set.

step()¶

Perform logical learning step. Training proceeds interleaving collection of data samples with policy gradient computations.

grads: list of tensors

List of actor_critic gradients.

infodict

Summary dict with relevant step information.

update_algo_parameter(parameter_name, new_parameter_value)¶

If parameter_name is an attribute of Worker.algo, change its value to new_parameter_value value.

parameter_namestr

Algorithm attribute name

update_networks(gradients)¶

Update Actor Critic model

nappo.schemes.workers_2dacs.cg_worker_set module¶

class nappo.schemes.workers_2dacs.cg_worker_set.CGWorkerSet(create_algo_instance, create_storage_instance, create_train_envs_instance, create_actor_critic_instance, create_test_envs_instance=<function CGWorkerSet.<lambda>>, worker_remote_config={'num_cpus': 1, 'num_gpus': 0.5}, num_workers=1)¶

nappo.schemes.workers_2dacs.u_worker module¶

class nappo.schemes.workers_2dacs.u_worker.UWorker(grad_workers)¶

Bases: object

Update worker. Handles actor_critic updates.

This worker receives gradients from gradient workers and then updates the its actor_critic model. Updated weights are synchronously sent back to gradient workers.

grad_workersWorkerSet

Set of workers computing and sending gradients to the UWorker.

num_updatesint

Number of times the actor_critic model has been updated.

grad_workersWorkerSet

Set of workers computing and sending gradients to the UWorker.

num_workersint

number of remote workers computing gradients.

save_model(fname)¶

Save current version of actor_critic as a torch loadable checkpoint.

fnamestr

Filename given to the checkpoint.

save_namestr

Path to saved file.

step()¶

Takes a logical asynchronous optimization step.

infodict

Summary dict of relevant information about the update process.

stop()¶

Stop remote workers

sync_weights()¶

Synchronize gradient worker models with updater worker model

update_algo_parameter(parameter_name, new_parameter_value)¶

If parameter_name is an attribute of Worker.algo, change its value to new_parameter_value value.

parameter_namestr

Algorithm attribute name
